TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ObjectListViewMode extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Specifies the display mode of the object list.

span.span: Specifies the display mode of the object list.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示モードはを介して使用できる、プロパティです。The display mode is available through the property. この列挙体の現在の表示モードを設定するユーザーの許可、コントロール。This enumeration allows the user to set the current display mode of the control. ある場合、と項目テンプレートでは、各項目にボタンを配置、ボタンをクリックしてイベントを処理して表示モードを設定、`Details`項目の詳細を表示するビュー。If you have an with an item template, you can place a button in each item, handle the click event on the button, and set the view mode to the `Details` view to show the item details. > [!NOTE] > この列挙体を設定する前に項目を選択する必要がありますまず`Commands`または`Details`ビュー。You must first select an item before setting this enumeration to `Commands` or `Details` view. 項目を選択する前に列挙型を設定しようとすると、例外をスローします。An attempt to set the enumeration before selecting an item throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode Commands = int32(1)

summary.span: Command's view in WML.

span.span: Command's view in WML.

summary.span: This is the default view displayed when the page containing the object list is rendered for the first time.

span.span: This is the default view displayed when the page containing the object list is rendered for the first time.

summary.span: It consists of either the label fields of the items, or (when TableFields is not empty) a table with columns corresponding to the table fields and rows corresponding to items.

span.span: It consists of either the label fields of the items, or (when TableFields is not empty) a table with columns corresponding to the table fields and rows corresponding to items.

summary.span: When there is more information in the view, a hyperlink for each item displaying the view is rendered, by default reading .

span.span: When there is more information in the view, a hyperlink for each item displaying the view is rendered, by default reading .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListViewMode Details = int32(2)

summary.span: Details view.

span.span: Details view.

summary.span: This view is rendered separately only for WML devices.

span.span: This view is rendered separately only for WML devices.

summary.span: It consists of a menu with the ObjectList's commands, along with an menu item displaying the view.

span.span: It consists of a menu with the ObjectList's commands, along with an menu item displaying the view.

summary.span: For HTML devices, this view is combined with the view, with the commands appearing as hyperlinks below the details.
